name: lufin
description: Lufin is a lightweight open-source personal finance manager that allows users to track earnings, expenses, budget categories, and generate simple financial reports through a web UI.

features.title: Income Management
features.description: Multiple income sources, Salary tracking, Revenue logging. Monitor all earnings

features.title: Financial Reports
features.description: Spending analysis, Income vs expenses, Trend visualization. Understand your financial health

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Custom categories, Subcategories, Flexible organization. Organize finances your way

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: CSV export, Backup data, Report generation. Keep your financial data portable

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted, No cloud tracking, Local storage. Your financial data stays private
